body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarFinders. My name is Daniel Murphy. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Daniel, my name is Laura Stewart.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Laura. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five three eight zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Can you also share with me your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Laura. We will reach out to you shortly with more information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was all. I'm feeling excited about finding a new car!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear, Laura. Thank you for your time. We look forward to helping you find the perfect car. Have a great day!
